nodes.title: CLIP Text Encode (Negative Prompt)
widgets_values: 过曝，静态，细节模糊不清，字幕，风格，作品，画作，画面，静止，整体发灰，最差质量，低质量，JPEG压缩残留，丑陋的，残缺的，多余的手指，画得不好的手部，画得不好的脸部，畸形的，毁容的，形态畸形的肢体，手指融合，静止不动的画面，杂乱的背景，三条腿，背景人很多，倒着走,过曝，

nodes.title: CLIP Text Encode (Positive Prompt)
widgets_values: A girl is dancing in a sea of flowers, slowly moving her hands, stretching her arms. There is a super close - up and a close - up of the upper body. The character is surrounded by other transparent glass flowers in the style of Nicoletta Ceccoli, creating a beautiful, surreal, and emotionally expressive movie scene. It has a white and transparent feeling, is dreamy, and in close range.

[Tutorial](https://docs.comfy.org/tutorials/video/wan/vace) 

## 14B Support 480P 720P

**Diffusion Model**
- [wan2.1_vace_14B_fp16.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/Wan_2.1_ComfyUI_repackaged/resolve/main/split_files/diffusion_models/wan2.1_vace_14B_fp16.safetensors)

**LoRA**
- [Wan21_CausVid_14B_T2V_lora_rank32.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/Kijai/WanVideo_comfy/blob/main/Wan21_CausVid_14B_T2V_lora_rank32.safetensors)

FYI: Using an RTX 4090, it takes approximately 40 minutes at 81 frames and 720P resolution.

After using Wan21_CausVid_14B_T2V_lora_rank32.safetensors, it only takes about 4 minutes.

## 1.3B Support 480P only

**Diffusion Model**
- [wan2.1_vace_1.3B_fp16.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/Wan_2.1_ComfyUI_repackaged/resolve/main/split_files/diffusion_models/wan2.1_vace_1.3B_fp16.safetensors)

**LoRA**
- [Wan21_CausVid_bidirect2_T2V_1_3B_lora_rank32.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/Kijai/WanVideo_comfy/blob/main/Wan21_CausVid_bidirect2_T2V_1_3B_lora_rank32.safetensors)

## Other Models

* You may already have these models if you use Wan workflow before.

**VAE**
- [wan_2.1_vae.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/Wan_2.1_ComfyUI_repackaged/resolve/main/split_files/vae/wan_2.1_vae.safetensors?download=true)

**Text encoders**   Chose one of following model
- [umt5_xxl_fp16.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/Wan_2.1_ComfyUI_repackaged/resolve/main/split_files/text_encoders/umt5_xxl_fp16.safetensors?download=true)
- [umt5_xxl_fp8_e4m3fn_scaled.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/Wan_2.1_ComfyUI_repackaged/resolve/main/split_files/text_encoders/umt5_xxl_fp8_e4m3fn_scaled.safetensors?download=true)

> You can choose between fp16 of fp8; I used fp16 to match what kijai's wrapper is compatible with.

File save location

```
ComfyUI/
├── models/
│   ├── diffusion_models/
│   │   ├-── wan2.1_vace_14B_fp16.safetensors
│   │   └─── wan2.1_vace_1.3B_fp16.safetensors 
│   ├── text_encoders/
│   │   └─── umt5_xxl_fp8_e4m3fn_scaled.safetensors # or fp16
│   ├── loras/
│   │   ├── Wan21_CausVid_14B_T2V_lora_rank32.safetensors
│   │   └── Wan21_CausVid_bidirect2_T2V_1_3B_lora_rank32.safetensors
│   └── vae/
│       └──  wan_2.1_vae.safetensors
```

## Report issue

If you have any problems while using this workflow, please report template-related issues via this link: [report the template issue here](https://github.com/Comfy-Org/workflow_templates/issues).

nodes.title: About CausVid LoRA
widgets_values: If you have enabled the Load LoRA node, you can try setting the `strength` between 0.3 and 0.7 to find the best result.

groups.title: Step3 - Video size (should be divisible by 16)
You can just keep these setting as default
